title: 登录失败**现在身份验证目前真在停机维护
author: 浪子皮皮鼠
txt_content:
image.png (7.01 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-25 15:34 上传




  如何解决？？就安装了个 禁止模组检测更新

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
浪子皮皮鼠 发表于 2020-3-25 15:37
但是服务器是外置登录得
找到 nu-whitelist.txt

添加你外置登录的域名

replies.author: 浪子皮皮鼠
replies.txt_content: 登录后  后台显示：com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile@778263a3[id=<null>,name=Xiao_Ye,properties={},legacy=false] (/127.0.0.1:55871) lost connection: Disconnected

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: server.properties 中设置 online-mode 项为 false

replies.author: 浪子皮皮鼠
